### PR summary [8f51556d4f](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19622/commits/8f51556d4f25f0d2edf45ea4258a879b3517d1f3)

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.RingTheory.PowerSeries.Order | 1045 | 1043 | -2 (-0.19%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.PowerSeries.Order`|-2|

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ add_lt_top`
`+ coe_inj`
`+ coe_le_coe`
`+ coe_lift`
`+ coe_lt_coe`
`+ forall_coeff_eq_zero`
`+ le_lift_iff`
`+ lift`
`+ lift_add`
`+ lift_coe`
`+ lift_le_iff`
`+ lift_lt_iff`
`+ lift_ofNat`
`+ lift_one`
`+ lift_zero`
`+ lt_lift_iff`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12104754818/job/33748532050)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12104754818/job/33748531898)
This one is quite strange; the whole point of PartENat is to make this type of thing computable, but then the implementation was noncomputable anyway!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: remove PartENat from PowerSeries
